descriptions: Architected a scalable event-driven pipeline using Node.js, AWS SQS, and ECS, successfully decoupling heavy media processing to handle 500+ concurrent jobs with 99.9% system reliability.
Optimized API response times by 50% by implementing S3 Multipart pre-signed URLs for direct chunked uploads and offloading CPU-intensive tasks to asynchronous Python background workers.

Engineered a multi-tenant SaaS platform for police departments, implementing a strict hierarchical RBAC system (Admin → Supervisor → Employee) to ensure granular data security and isolated view access.

Developed a multi-step registration workflow for an insurance platform using React.js and Tailwind CSS, successfully managing form state and API integrations under the mentorship of senior developers.
Gained production-ready proficiency in the MERN stack and PostgreSQL through intensive training, rapidly applying these skills to build responsive UI components and optimized backend schemas
